Here is a link to the most recent report by Brady regarding assault weapons:
 
 http://www.bradycenter.com/
 
 Please click on hypertext ""On Target: The Impact of the 1994 Federal Assault Weapons Act"
 
 It is an indepth study using BATFE statistics.
 
 What does the BATFE say?
 
 "the agency can "in no way vouch for the validity'' of the report." - http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/04088/292671.stm 
 
 Lesson? If your going to quote someone, better make sure they agree with you first.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Brady report "On Target"
